events.name: Symfony2 CMF HackNight
events.about:
Ideato is happy to invite you to the first Symfony CMF Hacknight taking place in Verona, Italy the day before the phpDay 2012.

The hacknight is a meeting to code and have beers about the Symfony CMF project, meant to give the community a chance to consolidate and enjoy results together.

The Symfony CMF hacknight only requires you to code. No matter how skilled you are, no matter how much beer you can drink, shut up & code! ;-)

Well... actually you are required to partecipate in discussing features, so... speak up & code!

The event will be a coding marathon to add new features, new tests, fix bugs and refactor code in close contact with other Symfony CMF coders.

Those attending the CMF hacknight will be granted a 15% discount for the phpDay 2012!
